      public static int getXFromHashChunkXYZ(int encoded)
      Extract the value of x from the hash chunk xyz. x occupies the highest 4 bits.
      Parameters:
      encoded - Encoded int containing x, y, and z.
      Returns:
      The value of x.

    • getYFromHashChunkXYZ

      public static int getYFromHashChunkXYZ(int encoded)
      Extract the value of y from the hash chunk xyz. y occupies the middle 24 bits.
      Parameters:
      encoded - Encoded int containing x, y, and z.
      Returns:
      The value of y.

    • getZFromHashChunkXYZ

      public static int getZFromHashChunkXYZ(int encoded)
      Extract the value of z from the hash chunk xyz. z occupies the lowest 4 bits.
      Parameters:
      encoded - Encoded int containing x, y, and z.
      Returns:
      The value of z.
